instruction: Generate a recipe for a vegetarian meal that includes brown rice and black beans.
output: Vegetarian Brown Rice and Black Bean Bowl – This easy and nutritious recipe makes a tasty vegan meal. Start by cooking the brown rice according to package instructions. In a skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil and add 1 chopped onion, stirring until lightly browned. Add 2 cloves of minced garlic and one red bell pepper, chopped, and cook for 5 minutes. Add 1 cup of black beans and ½ teaspoon of chili powder and cumin, stirring until heated through. Add the cooked rice and cook for 5 minutes more. Serve in a bowl with a garnish of ¼ cup cilantro, limes, and avocado. Enjoy!
